name: HomegearNodeBase::output
shortDescription: Sends data to a node output
description: This method is only available within a Node-BLUE node. It sends data out of the node's outputs to the next connected nodes.

parameters.name: outputIndex
parameters.description: The zero-based index of the output.

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: The associative array containing the message. There must at least be the element "payload"
